div.style: font-family: sans-serif; background: #1e1e1e; color: #ccc; border-radius: 6px; padding: 8px; font-size: 13px;

pre.style: background: #252526; color: #dcdcaa; padding: 6px; border-radius: 4px; overflow-x: auto;

button.style: background: #0E639C; color: white; border: none; padding: 4px 10px; border-radius: 3px; cursor: pointer;
background: #555; color: white; border: none; padding: 4px 10px; border-radius: 3px; cursor: pointer;
